name: Buy X Get Y Free by StorePro
author: StorePro

sections.description:
Buy X Get Y Plugin

Are you looking to add some promotional products to your cart? Here you go! The Buy X Get Y by StorePro allows you to achieve your goal. You can add the desired free product to the cart along with the main product with the help of simply arranged plugin settings.

Installation

Activate the Buy X Get Y plugin. Go to the Buy X Get Y settings and follow the Steps.

-Enable ‘Buy X Get Y’ globally
-Enable Cart Message (Optional)
-Add custom Cart Message
-Select the Main Product
-Select the Quantity of Main Product
-Select the Free Product
-Select the Quantity of Free Product
-Save

That’s It. You are Ready to Go!
sections.changelog:
1.2.1 – 2024-08-22

  • Bug Fixes
  • Improvement: Fixed API compatibility issues.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 9.2.1 , WordPress 6.6

1.2.0 – 2024-07-17

  • Bug Fixes – Technical error.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 9.1.2 , WordPress 6.6 and PHP version 8.2

1.1.9 – 2024-05-29

  • Bug Fixes – Technical error.

1.1.8 – 2024-05-28

  • Bug Fixes – Resolved cart update & remove functionality issue.

1.1.7 – 2024-05-20

  • Tested compatibility with wordpress 6.5.3 and woocommerce 8.8.3
  • Bug Fixes
  • Style updates

1.1.6 – 2023-10-31

  • Tested compatibility with wordpress 6.3.2 and woocommerce 8.2.1

1.1.5 – 2023-07-31

  • Tested compatibility with wordpress 6.2.2 and woocommerce 7.9.0

1.1.4 – 2022-08-29

  • In addition to the current single option to select Buy Product X Get Product Y, we have added provisions to select two more main products and it’s corresponding promotional products.
  • Tested compatibility with wordpress 6.0.1 and woocommerce 6.8.2

1.1.3 – 2022-06-03

  • Tested compatibility with wordpress 6.0 and woocommerce 6.5.1

1.1.2 – 2022-06-03

  • Tested with wordpress 6.0 and woocommerce 6.5.1

1.1.1 – 2022-01-28

  • Ability to disable the ribbon on the free product

1.1.0 – 2022-01-18

  • Tested with wordpress 5.8.3 and woocommerce 6.1.0
  • Bug Fixes

1.0.9 – 2021-12-22

  • Tested with woocommerce 6.0.0
  • Bug Fixes

1.0.8 – 2021-12-13

  • Bug Fixes – Issue on Undo functionality to restore the free product along with the main product has been fixed.

1.0.7 – 2021-11-30

  • Bug Fixes

1.0.6 – 2021-11-26

  • Tested with wordpress 5.8.2 and woocommerce 5.9.0
  • New Features are added. Ability to add a customized message for the free product on product page and on shop page. Ability to remove the free product if required.

1.0.5 – 2021-10-27

  • Tested with wordpress 5.8.1 and woocommerce 5.8.0

1.0.4 – 2021-09-06

  • Tested with wordpress 5.8 and woocommerce 5.6.0

1.0.3 – 2020-11-09

  • Tested with wordpress 5.6 and woocommerce 4.8.0

1.0.2 – 2020-10-27

  • New feature added for custom cart message

1.0.1 – 2020-09-21

  • Fix – Bug with Yoast SEO plugin

1.0 – 2020-08-10

  • Initial Public Release

short_description: Buy X Get Y by StorePro is a plugin allows you to add a gift product in your cart.
